content.text: A description list is a list of terms, with a description of each term.

The <dl> tag defines the description list, the 
<dt> tag defines the term (name), and the 
<dd> 
tag describes each term:

codes.code:
<dl>
 
<dt>Coffee</dt>
 
<dd>- black hot drink</dd>
 
<dt>Milk</dt>
 
<dd>- white cold drink</dd>
</dl>

content.text:
Use the HTML <dl> element to define a description list
  Use the HTML <dt> element to define the description term
  Use the HTML <dd> element to describe the term in a description list

data: Defines a term in a description list
Describes the term in a description list
